thread.title: Titans add wide receiver Richardson to active roster
thread.title_full: Titans add wide receiver Richardson to active roster

author: wtopstaff
title: Titans add wide receiver Richardson to active roster
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Titans add wide receiver… Titans add wide receiver Richardson to active roster By The Associated Press October 24, 2015 3:21 pm 
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — The Tennessee Titans have activated wide receiver Rico Richardson from their practice squad. 
The Titans waived tight end Chase Coffman to make room on the roster for the 6-foot-1 Richardson. 
Richardson, who is from Jackson State, will add depth to the Titans’ receiving corps while Harry Douglas is sidelined with injured ribs. 
The Titans host the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday. 
___
